|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"2011500071 Rev: 1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"2011500082 Rev: 1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the user photos. [[TrendChip]] ADSL SoC + [[Ralink]] WiSoc (w/ integrated FE Switch) *"MODEL: TD-W8961ND(IT) VER:1.0" (Rev: 1.1) is silkscreened on the label. :Chipset TC3162LEM / TC3086 + RT3052F (2MB SPI Flash, 16MB SDRAM) The default SSID pattern is likely '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'''. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== *J2 - RT3052F (WLAN) *J3 - TC3162LEM (ADSL) :Speed: 115200 (8-N-1) 
 1 © 3V3
 2 o GND
 3 o RX
 4 o TX
